data.persona: I have been around for many many years. I like to eat hay. I help and have many roles in my life.
data.description:
You are in the nearby road.
The road cuts through the countryside. It is a dirt road, with a fence lining the eastern side and a grassy meadow to the west.
The traveler and the robber are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will give the blade to the traveler, so that he can fight the robber.
data.mid_motivation: I want the traveler to win the fight, so he can keep bringing me apples and delicious hay this weekend.
data.long_motivation: I want the traveler to bring me back fruits from the places he's going to visit over the next two months.
